bibliographic-data.invention-title: Methods and apparatus for distributing content to support multiple customer service entities and content packagers

abstract.p: System for distributing content to support multiple customer service entities and content packagers. A method is provided for distributing content. The method comprises receiving BCS parameters that identify one or more content packagers that are associated with one or more BCS providers. The method also includes receiving packager parameters that describe one or more packages associated with the one or more content packagers. The method also includes generating system information that comprises the BCS parameters and the packager parameters, and transmitting the system information.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METODOS Y APARATO PARA DISTRIBUIR CONTENIDO PARA SUSTENTAR MULTIPLES ENTIDADAES DE SERVICIOS AL CONSUMIDOR EMPAQUETADORES DE CONTENIDO

abstract.p: Sistema para distribuir contenido para sustentar multiples entidades del servicio al consumidor y empaquetadores de contenido. Se provee un método para distribuir contenido. El método comprende recibir parámetros de BCS que identifican uno o mas empaquetadores de contenido que están asociados con uno o mas proveedores de BCS. El método además incluye recibir parámetros de empaquetadores que describen uno o mas paquetes asociados con uno o mas empaquetadores de contenido. El método además incluye generar informacion del sistema que comprende los parámetros BCS y los parámetros del empaquetador, y transmitir la informacion del sistema.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: método e equipamentos para distribuir conteúdo para suportar múltiplas entidades de serviço ao cliente e empacotadores e conteúdo

abstract.p: MéTODOS E EQUIPAMENTOS PARA DISTRIBUIR CONTEUDO PARA SUPORTAR MULTIPLAS ENTIDADES DE SERVIçO AO CLIENTE E EMPACOTADORES DE CONTEUDO Sistema para a distribuição de conteúdo parasuportar múltiplas entidades de serviço ao cliente e empacotadores de conteúdo. Um método é fornecido para a distribuição de conteúdo. O método compreende receber parâmetros BCS que identificam um ou mais empacotadores de conteúdo que são associados com um ou mais provedores BCS.O método também inclui receber parâmetros de empacotador que descrevem um ou mais pacotes associados com um ou mais empacotadores de conteúdo. O método também incluí gerar ainformação de sistema que compreende os parâmetros BCS e os parâmetros de empacotador, e transmitindo a informação de sistema.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR DISTRIBUTING INFORMATION CONTENT WHICH SUPPORT SEVERAL CLIENT SERVICING OBJECTS AND INFORMATION CONTENT PACKET COMPILERS

abstract.p: FIELD: information technology. ^ SUBSTANCE: invention provides a method of distributing information content. The method involves reception of parametres which identify one or more compilers of information content packets associated with one or more providers. The method also involves reception of parametres of packet compilers which describe one or more packets associated with one or more compilers of information content packets. The method also involves generation of system information which contains "ñÜ" parametres and parametres of packet compilers, and transmission of system information. ^ EFFECT: distribution of information content with formation of parametres of providers and several compilers of information content packets associated with these providers, faster client servicing. ^ 38 cl, 11 dwg

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Methods and apparatus for distributing content to support multiple customer service entities and content packagers
METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR DISTRIBUTING CONTENT TO SUPPORT MULTIPLE CUSTOMER SERVICE ENTITIES AND CONTENT PACKAGERS
METHODES ET APPAREILS POUR DISTRIBUER UN CONTENU POUR PRENDRE EN CHARGE PLUSIEURS ENTITES DE SERVICES CLIENTS ET DES SYSTEMES DE CONDITIONNEMENT DE CONTENU

abstract.p: System for distributing content to support multiple customer service entities and content packagers. A method is provided for distributing content. The method comprises receiving BCS parameters that identify one or more content packagers that are associated with one or more BCS providers. The method also includes receiving packager parameters that describe one or more packages associated with the one or more content packagers. The method also includes generating system information that comprises the BCS parameters and the packager parameters, and transmitting the system information.

L'invention concerne un système pour distribuer un contenu pour prendre en charge plusieurs entités de services clients et des systèmes de conditionnement de contenu. L'invention concerne une méthode pour distribuer un contenu. Cette méthode consiste à recevoir des paramètres de service de facturation et de client (BCS) identifiant au moins un dispositif de conditionnement de contenu associé à au moins un fournisseur BCS. Cette méthode consiste également à recevoir des paramètres de dispositif de conditionnement décrivant au moins un conditionnement associé au dispositif de conditionnement de contenu. Cette méthode consiste encore à générer des informations de système comprenant les paramètres BCS et les paramètres de dispositif de conditionnement, et à transmettre ces informations de système.
